patthana14.4:1.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:1.1_1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:1.1_2: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:2.1_0: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:2.1_1: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:2.1_2: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:3.1_0: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:3.1_1: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.4:3.1_2: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
